title: Comely 4br House for Rent.OFF-STREET PARKING.available in august.
posting_body: Four bedroom house with yard for rent from August 10th-June 1st.
The house has hardwood floors, granite countertops, stainless appliances, washer/dryer (gas), and is cable ready.
Located on a quiet dead-end street, beach and dock access, an easy walking distance to the Town Landing Market it offers a relaxing atmosphere.
Excellent schools, convenient proximity to Portland, and a wonderful neighborhood make it a great place to live.
$1000 monthly plus utilities (Natural Gas Heat- 98% Efficient System), deposit, and cleaning fee.
Waiting for <URL>e and see and move in.
